name: Xerberus
description: Xerberus is a risk and asset management blockchain designed to provide services to other blockchain ecosystems. Each node within the Xerberus blockchain computes an open-source risk model, assessing risk for most crypto assets within partner ecosystems. The produced risk ratings can be used by dApps to improve resilience and capital efficiency. Investors can benefit directly from Xerberus Risk Ratings by investing in Xerberus indexes, which provide the most secure and decentralized way to benefit from crypto volatility.
